meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error in a planned action or speech.
meanings.sent1: She kept miscueing her lines during the play rehearsal.
meanings.sent2: He tends to miscue when he is nervous.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's miscueing of the punchline made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her miscueing of the dance steps turned the performance into a comedy.
meanings.sent5: The student's constant miscueing finally led to a hilarious outcome.

meanings.definition: A mistake or error in a planned action or speech.
meanings.sent1: The miscueing in his speech caused confusion among the listeners.
meanings.sent2: The team's miscueing cost them the game.
meanings.sent3: The miscueing of the recipe resulted in a funny-tasting cake.
meanings.sent4: The miscueing of the clock led to chaos in the schedule.
meanings.sent5: The miscueing of the directions left them lost in the city.
